description.translate: Many times lost, but always with regret.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Sigial\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7De nombreuse fois égaré,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais toujours avec regret.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Many times lost,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but always with regret.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7LUC§c-1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
